level.text: Prosecution for violations of any provision of these regulations shall be conducted in the name of the District of Columbia in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia by the Corporation Counsel or by an Assistant Corporation Counsel.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: D.C. Act 5-129, ยง 8(b) published at 31 DCR 2331, 2339 (May 18, 1984).
